question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. projector
B. screen
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The projector and screen are both on the ceiling and wall respectively, but their relative depth is ambiguous in the 2D image without a depth map; the projector is likely closer to the camera than the screen, but this requires careful 3D spatial reasoning.
